text:
The latest (0.16.13) version of `cms-dev-server` has been updated to include a `<meta name="viewport"` tag so that mobile devices & browser emulator should now show the responsive versions of your module previews correctly

cc <@U07FG3XCBC6>

Is there an updated change log that’s viewable anywhere? <https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/release-log.html|the docs> haven’t been updated in months & I’m not sure how to figure out when it’s worth updating for any new features or bug-fixes.
